name: Citadale - Gate of Souls
description:
The night just got much deadlier...

You are Sonja Dorleac, weilder of the Shadow Blade, the only sword capable of defeating the Dark Lord of ancient times, resurrected in an old castle, ready to plunge the lands into chaos. With only your wit and courage, you have to fight your way through six stages of undead horrors, tough bosses and filled with traps.
Can you unlock the castle's secrets?

- 8 bit retro styled design
- Six action packed stages filled with dangers and traps
- Secrets to discover and hidden modes to unlock
- Chiptune sound FTW

This game is included in 'Citadale - The Legends Trilogy'
